author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss AnduinOS one of the best Windows-like Distros I've reviewed in a while. It's an ubuntu based distro made by Anduin Xue, a .NET engineer that works for Microsoft and develops AnduinOS in his free time.
https://www.anduinos.com/

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

Subscribe to me on Odysee.com
https://odysee.com/@AlphaNerd:8
